features: Seat can be mounted/dismounted from bike in seconds with the universal quick release bracket
Integrated protection wings keep your child’s hands safe and out of harm’s way when the bike is leaned against a wall
Smooth, comfortable ride for your child with the DualBeam suspension system that absorbs road shock
Childproof safety buckle with large buttons quickly secures child
Added visibility thanks to built-in reflector and safety light attachment point
Adjustable foot straps and foot rests for flexibility as your child grows
Adjustable 3-point harness ensures your child’s safety.
